<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E;background:
white">本文经「原理」（微信公众号：<span lang="EN-US">principia1687</span>）授权转载，禁止二次转载</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">在前两期的文章中我们介绍了<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzA4NDU1MDY5OA==&mid=2653187267&idx=1&sn=ad8bc30a79deb881ef91ab0ec9c59cef&chksm=8435b986b34230908a3828a86ea47818fa409996b5b280eb9c03b026683559b3a96e1eff1711&scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="color:#4395F5">图灵机</span></a></span>和<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzA4NDU1MDY5OA==&mid=2653187313&idx=1&sn=753b19372e008cdcfbffd9a57d233bdd&chksm=8435b9b4b34230a297112fae6d6bb0abe212d0b0cd228e4a3f0d94f51b5a0ce9fa2fe47ddde3&scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="color:#4395F5">λ算子</span></a></span>对计算机发展的影响。图灵机和λ算子之间的区别是：图灵机强调的是过程，而λ算子强调的是结果。基于这两种不同，也因此演化出了当今的两大类编程语言：命令式编程和函数式编程。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">这一期我们将更深入的走进图灵机和λ算子的原理，看看它们是如何做最基本的计算并以此为基础构建出现代计算机的。距上一次的计算机系列更新已经有一段时间了，在这里笔者向大家表示歉意，其主要原因是这篇文章的背后大量的数学推理，而笔者要做的便是尽量掩盖数学的复杂性并用最简单的语言阐述其原理。希望有兴趣的读者可以在这篇文章的基础上做进一步的研究。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">为了描述的简洁，本文用基础乘法运算（<span lang="EN-US">2 x 3</span>）为例来描述图灵机和λ算子的运算方式。之所以用乘法为例，是因为乘法运算中包含了重复的加法运算，而减法和除法运算可分别转化成加法（加一个相反数）和乘法运算（乘以一个倒数）。在了解了乘法运算原理的基础上，我们可以同理得出另外三则运算的原理。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">我们先来回顾一下图灵机的结构。在之前的文章中我们讲到，图灵机由一个无限长的纸带（<span lang="EN-US">TAPE</span>），读写头（<span lang="EN-US">HEAD</span>），一套控制读写头移动规则的规则表（<span lang="EN-US">TABLE</span>）和一个状态寄存器（<span lang="EN-US">REGISTER</span>）组成，如图一所示。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
lang=EN-US><span style='mso-element:field-begin;mso-field-lock:yes'></span><span

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#888888">△<span lang="EN-US"> </span>图一：图灵机结构</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#888888"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">纸带被分为无限个格子（起始格由<span lang="EN-US">S</span>表示），可记录任何字母，二进制数字（<span lang="EN-US">0,1</span>）以及空白（由<span lang="EN-US">B</span>表示）。每个格子里代表了图灵机的输入和输出信息而空白则表示没有任何信息。上方箭头为读写头，表示当前读写（输入输出）的位置。读写头可向左右移动，每次移动一格。其移动方向由当下读写头所指的输入和规则表决定（规则表其实就是当时控制计算机的程序）。读写头首先记录下当下位置的状态（<span lang="EN-US">q</span>）并存入状态寄存器，然后根据当下输入对比程序中的要求进行左右移动或停留在当下位置，最后根据程序输出字母或数字，修改新的位置的数字或字母。每次工作图灵机的读写头都会从起始位置开始，由规则表和输入控制其移动到不同位置，并最终在程序结束时停留在空白格里。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">接下来我们以<span lang="EN-US"> 2 x
3 </span>为例，来看图灵机如何做运算。首先图灵机会以两个<span lang="EN-US">1</span>表示数字<span lang="EN-US">2</span>，用三个<span lang="EN-US">1</span>表示数字<span lang="EN-US">3</span>，并将他们写在纸带上，由数字<span lang="EN-US">0</span>表示结束，如图二所示。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#888888">△<span lang="EN-US"> </span>图二：基础乘法中的图灵机设置。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">S</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">表示开始位置，前两个<span lang="EN-US">1</span>表示被乘数<span lang="EN-US">2</span>并由<span lang="EN-US">0</span>表示结束，接着的三个<span lang="EN-US">1</span>表示乘数<span lang="EN-US">3</span>并由<span lang="EN-US">0</span>表示结束。<span lang="EN-US"> B</span>表示空白格，而最终所得出的结果会在空白各种表示出来。我们知道计算结果会是<span lang="EN-US">6</span>，所以我们预期的结果应该是有<span lang="EN-US">6</span>个空白格被写上<span lang="EN-US">1. </span>那么图灵机是怎么做到的呢<span lang="EN-US">?<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">其最终的思想是将乘数（三个<span lang="EN-US">1</span>）复制两次到空白格上。</span></strong><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">我们一步一步来看：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:24.0pt;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 36.0pt;background:white"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:

mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:

color:#3E3E3E">0</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;

16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#888888">△<span lang="EN-US"> </span>图三：基础乘法中的图灵机的中间状态。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#888888"><br>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">由图三我们可以看出，在结束以上六个步骤之后，我们成功地将乘数中的三个<span lang="EN-US">1</span>复制到了三个空白格中。那么接下来我们需要做的就是将以上步骤再做一次。首先我们需要在图<span lang="EN-US">3</span>的基础上，将读写头向左移动（每次一格子）直到遇到<span lang="EN-US">B</span>。需要注意的是，在该过程中，如果遇到<span lang="EN-US">Y</span>，读写头会将<span lang="EN-US">Y</span>改写成<span lang="EN-US">1</span>。此时读写头会在起始位置<span lang="EN-US">S</span>后面的空白格<span lang="EN-US">B</span>上，图三中的所有<span lang="EN-US">Y</span>也将被改写成为<span lang="EN-US">1</span>。在此基础上，我们可以再次重复做之前提到的六个步骤，并得到最终状态如图四所示。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">经过一系列的读写头移动及对纸带的读写，图灵机成功的将乘数（三个<span lang="EN-US">1</span>）复制了两次，完成了<span lang="EN-US"> 2 x 3 </span>的计算。上述的整个运行步骤可以被看作是写在图灵机上的程序，并存在规则表中。如果用有限状态机来表示规则表的内容，上述的整个运行步骤可由图五表示。其中每一个<span lang="EN-US">q</span>表示一个状态，<span lang="EN-US">L</span>和<span lang="EN-US">R</span>表示读写头向左或向右移动一格，<span lang="EN-US"> A/B </span>表示读写头将格子中的<span lang="EN-US">A</span>改写为<span lang="EN-US">B</span>。例如，<span lang="EN-US">1/B,R </span>表示读写头将格子中的<span lang="EN-US">1</span>改写成为<span lang="EN-US">B</span>，并向右移动一格。<span lang="EN-US">Accept </span>表示程序完成时读写头的状态。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#888888">△<span lang="EN-US"> </span>图五：基础乘法中的图灵机规则表。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">至此我们介绍了图灵机的乘法运算原理，所有其他运算也都可以在此基础上如法炮制，笔者在这里不做赘述。最后，笔者用一小段的篇幅介绍一下与图灵机等价的λ算子是如何做四则运算的。因所涉及的数学较多，笔者在此仅介绍λ算子中的运算原理。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:
inter-ideograph;line-height:24.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">在λ算子中，我们通过定义两个函数，零（<span lang="EN-US">zero</span>）和后趋势（<span lang="EN-US">successor</span>）为基础，从而推导出其他运算方式的λ算子表达式。如图六所示，我们通过定义零和后驱得到加法的λ算子表达式，并通过加法的λ算子表达式进而推导出乘法的λ算子表达式。任意两个数字可以赋值于λ算子表达式上，并通过<span lang="EN-US">alpha-</span>变换规则和<span lang="EN-US">beta-</span>规约规则得到运算结果。与图灵机不同的是，λ算子作为纯数学表达在运算时并没有机器状态改变的这一概念。也正是因为这一特征，λ算子与图灵机共同构造了计算机中的“计算”与“机”的概念。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:19.2pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>
